short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple daily planner with memo functionality and data export options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
제품 이름: Koala Planner
카테고리: 생산성
기기: Chrome
언어: 한국어

설명:
Koala Planner는 간단하고 효율적인 일정 관리를 위한 플래너입니다.

주요 기능:
• 직관적인 캘린더 인터페이스
• 날짜별 메모 작성 및 관리
• 완료 체크 기능
• 데이터 내보내기 (TXT, CSV, JSON)
• 자동 저장 및 동기화
• 오프라인 지원

특징:
• 깔끔한 사용자 인터페이스
• 간편한 메모 작성
• 주말 구분 (토/일 색상 구분)
• 메모가 있는 날짜 표시
• 데이터 백업 기능

문의: jjwlawyer@naver.com

Product Name: Koala Planner
Category: Productivity
Device: Chrome
Language: English, Korean

Description:
Koala Planner is a simple and efficient daily planner designed for easy schedule management.

Key Features:
- Intuitive calendar interface
- Date-specific memo management
- Task completion tracking
- Data export options (TXT, CSV, JSON)
- Auto-save and synchronization
- Offline support

Highlights:
- Clean user interface
- Easy memo creation
- Weekend distinction (Sat/Sun color coding)
- Visual indicators for dates with memos
- Data backup functionality

Privacy Policy:

1. Data Collection
- This extension only collects user memo data.
- All data is stored locally in the user's browser.

2. Data Usage
- Memo storage and management
- Feature provision for user convenience

3. Data Storage and Deletion
- All data is stored only in the user's browser
- All data is deleted when the extension is removed

4. Contact
- Privacy related inquiries: jjwlawyer@naver.com

How to Use:
1. Click the Koala Planner icon to open the planner
2. Select a date on the calendar
3. Add, edit, or delete memos for the selected date
4. Mark tasks as completed when done
5. Export your data in various formats as needed

Perfect for:
- Daily task management
- Simple schedule tracking
- Quick note-taking
- Personal planning

Technical Details:
- Lightweight and fast
- No external server connection
- Secure local storage
- Cross-platform compatibility

Updates:
- Regular updates for performance improvements
- Bug fixes and feature enhancements
- User feedback implementation

Support:
For technical support or feature requests, please contact:
Email: jjwlawyer@naver.com
Blog: https://sunbykoala.tistory.com/


planner, daily planner, schedule, memo, task manager, calendar, todo list, productivity, organizer, time management
